mapper.select: SELECT mem.rownum as meRownum , mem.num as num , mem.id as id , mem.name as name , mem.grade as grade , mem.schoolClass as schoolClass , mem.tel as tel , mem.postcode as postcode , mem.roadAddress as roadAddress , mem.jibunAddress as jibunAddress , mem.email as email , mem.level as level , mem.stName as stName , mem.sms as sms , mem.gender as gender , mem.date as date FROM ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rownum, MEMBER.* FROM MEMBER, (SELECT @rownum :=0) n where meFlag=0 ORDER BY rownum ASC ) mem
